word:
Chap. 7 - Reopening of Battle Creek College


                         Nashville, June, 1904. 

     When I first heard of the reopening of Battle Creek College, I was in great distress; for I knew that this, if managed as some desired, would call many young people there. I knew that this move, if unopposed, would bring results very different from those intended or anticipated by some connected with the movement.
